sectionText: Restricted to James Scholars Program and First Freshman Students in Liberal Arts Sciences.  Section 54870.  This discussion is for James Scholars students only.  If you have any questions about the project, the time commitment or anything else, please email the instructor, Eric Snodgrass (snodgrss@atmos.uiuc.edu).
sectionNotes: Restricted to Liberal Arts & Sciences. Restricted to students with Freshman class standing.
